The East Coast braces for massive category 3 storm Hurricane Irene.
Ships of the U.S. Second Fleet pull out of port to ride out the storm at sea.
A messenger delivers the passport of former IMF head Dominique Strauss-Kahn leaving him free to leave the country.
Billionaire investor Warren Buffett invests 5 billion dollars in troubled Bank of America.
The IMF spokesman in Washington says the organization will aid Libya with reconstruction efforts.
The Yankees set a major league record with 3 grand slams and beat the A's 22 to 9.
